page.title: 17A Sponsored Walk
page.content: It is now common practice for schools to raise money for capital expenditure by staging fund_raising events. We,at Hadley Junior,were recently faced with such a problem.We wished to upgrade our coumputers' storage system from tape cassettes to Floppy discs. The problem,of course,was the Â£200+ which would be needed. Two members of staff decided to enter a local{'fun walk'}and asked the children to obtain sponsorship on their behalf. The response from the children was overwhelming,over Â£300 was raised, enabling the school to buy two disc drives,a supply of floppy discs and small cabinets to keep them safe. In addition we were able to buy 3 adventure programs and some much needed books for the library.
